text: Belleydoux is a commune. It is found in the region Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. In 2009, 310 people lived in the commune. The inhabitants are the Belleydousans. Famous people from Belleydoux include Gabriel Taborin, a 20th-century religious man. Category:Communes in Ain
title: Belleydoux
